name: Cat-livery!(Cat Delivery)
description:
This is a submission to the Ludum Dare 51 game jam.

Cat-Livery(Cat Delivery) is a delivery game where you deliver burgers to different locations before time runs out.

How to play:

-Every 10 seconds, a new package is ready for delivery at the burger shop.

-Once a burger is ready for delivery, houses will send orders.

-If you are holding an order, you cannot collect a new one till said order is delivered first.

-Once a new order is called, you have 25 seconds to deliver it before the order is cancelled.

-Cancelling the order makes you lose one star. Lose all 5 and you lose the game.

Controls:

WASD or Arrow keys to move

Credits: Programming and Art - M1chaelDev: https://valtaria-studios.itch.io/

Music and SFX - David Arango Valencia: www.playsound.studio
